definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: If you're starting out, you'll need tools to till the soil.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是個新手，你需要工具把地整理得適合種菜。

sentences.english: Alex and Tony were turning awkward hands to plows and hoe handles.
sentences.chinese: 亞歷克斯和託尼在犁耙等農活方面都幾乎變成新手了。

sentences.english: Recently for a new phone, the inevitable father was a father around.
sentences.chinese: 最近換了個新手機，不可避免的到處得瑟得瑟。

sentences.english: I'm not just being diplomatic here either.
sentences.chinese: 在片場，我也只是個經驗不足的新手。

sentences.english: However, I'm new here in ET2 and not too familiar with their chatr oom .
sentences.chinese: 不過呢，在ET2我還是新手不太熟悉他們的系統。

sentences.english: Nothing says "novice" like a lunging, line-drive shot that comes from your chest.
sentences.chinese: 突破，急停然後從胸部出手投籃，說明你是一個新手。

sentences.english: She's a doormat in the company, even the green hand can wrong her.
sentences.chinese: 她在公司就是個受氣包，甚至新手也可以欺負她。

sentences.english: The rookie turned out to be the best hitter on the team.
sentences.chinese: 新手證明是隊裏最出色的擊球員。

sentences.english: A: Do you think Mr. White is a greenhorn at editing?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得White先生在編輯方面是新手嗎？

sentences.english: Because of this the novice wants frequent quick wins and regular feedback.
sentences.chinese: 因此，新手需要頻繁迅速的成就感和有規律的反饋。

sentences.english: So how does the neophyte collector find his or her way through this jungle?
sentences.chinese: 收藏新手們如何在這重重森林中找對路子呢？

sentences.english: Toil and sweat done, an apprentice meditates before a Shinto shrine.
sentences.chinese: 一個新手在付出辛勞和汗水後蹲坐在神社前。

sentences.english: He is still gren at this job.
sentences.chinese: 他是個新手，對此工作尚還生疏。

sentences.english: Hello, I'd like to get a new cell phone number.
sentences.chinese: 妳好，我想要申辦一個新手機門號。

sentences.english: I am a complete beginner to bird-keeping.
sentences.chinese: 在養鳥方面，我完全是一個新手。

sentences.english: For one, I don't need a new phone. Except for some reception problems, my StarTac works fine.
sentences.chinese: 我不需要新手機，除了面子上的問題，我的摩托羅拉。

definition: (slang) novice/greenhorn/fool/idiot/abbr. for 小白臉|小白脸[xiao3 bai2 lian3], pretty boy
entrance door/to enter a door/introduction (to a subject)
to obtain/to master/overhand (serve etc)/seat of honor
a trick/an ingenious method/know-how/the knack (of doing sth)
the person himself/I (humble form used in speeches)/oneself/myself/in person/personal
course of study/teaching module at university/tutorial
